short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nametags are universal usernames stored on blockchain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Nametag extension lets you display your Nametag & NFT collection directly on your Twitter profile. Your collection will be viewable by anyone who has the extension installed and visits your profile.
